summary: I've been learning that it's okay to stutter and I've made new friends. I'm excited to do the big dance tonight and I need to get ready for it. I used to feel like I was the only one who stuttered and it made me upset, but I talked to my speech therapist and she helped me. I've met a lot of kids who are very sweet and we've become close friends. I've learned that stuttering makes me special and unique, and it's okay to stutter.
quotes: it makes you special just the way you are
